info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 4:19AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Possible Tuesday Afternoon and Early Evening... Although these counties are not currently under a Watch or Warning for fire danger on Tuesday, it is becoming increasingly probable that critical fire weather conditions could develop during the afternoon and early evening. A this time, the forecast calls for a combination of northwesterly winds gusting 30 to 40 MPH and relative humidity dropping between 15 and 20 percent, especially between 3 and 8 PM. Despite the absence of a formal Watch or Warning at this time, caution is certainly advised on Tuesday afternoon and early evening if engaging in any activity that could possibly spark a wildfire.
